name................................skipped Then Enter BiqQuery property encryption key name "cmekBQ" if cmek is enabled.skipped Then Toggle BigQuery sink property truncateTable to true....................skipped Then Toggle BigQuery sink property updateTableSchema to true................skipped Then Validate "BigQuery" plugin properties..................................skipped Then Close the BigQuery properties..........................................skipped Then Connect source as "GCS" and sink as "BigQuery" to establish connection.skipped Then Save the pipeline......................................................skipped Then Preview and run the pipeline...........................................skipped Then Verify the preview of pipeline is "success"............................skipped Then Close the preview......................................................skipped Then Deploy the pipeline....................................................skipped Then Run the Pipeline in Runtime............................................skipped Then Wait till pipeline is in running state.................................skipped Then Open and capture logs..................................................skipped Then Verify the pipeline status is "Succeeded"..............................skipped Then Get count of no of records transferred to target BigQuery Table........skipped Then Validate the cmek key "cmekBQ" of target BigQuery table if cmek is enabled.skipped
